org.jvnet.hk2.config

Interface ObservableBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigBean, Dom

    public interface ObservableBean
    Implementation of a @Configured object can optionally fire configuration change events when it's mutated.
    Author:
    Jerome Dochez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(ConfigListener listener)
      Add a new listener to configuration changes.
      boolean removeListener(ConfigListener listener)
      Remove a listener

    • Method Detail

        Add a new listener to configuration changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - new listener

      • removeListener

        boolean removeListener(ConfigListener listener)
        Remove a listener
        Parameters:
        listener - to remove
        Returns:
        true if listener removal was successful.
